GPT_response.title: Neuralink Raises Additional $43M
GPT_response.background: Neuralink, the brain implant startup founded by Elon Musk, has secured an additional $43 million in venture capital. The company is developing implantable chips that can read brain waves.
GPT_response.summary: Neuralink, Elon Musk's brain implant startup, has raised $43 million in venture capital, bringing its total funding to $323 million. The company aims to develop implantable chips capable of reading brain waves.
